'''Mirror of Galadriel''' may refer to:
==Middle-earth==
*[[Mirror of Galadriel]], the basin of water which could show far away visions of the past, present, and future, used by [[Galadriel]].
==Chapters==
*[[The Mirror of Galadriel]], the seventh chapter of the second book of [[The Fellowship of the Ring]].
==Adaptations==
*[[The Mirror of Galadriel (scene)]], the scene from ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''
